net.nicoulaj.benchmark.mockwebapp.config.when
Interface WhenStatement

All Superinterfaces:
ConfigFragment
All Known Implementing Classes:
HeaderCondition, MethodCondition, RemoteAddressCondition, URLCondition
public interface WhenStatement
extends ConfigFragment

A WhenStatement is a condition to match HTTP requests against.

Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Julien Nicoulaud
See Also:
Mapping.whenStatements

Method Detail

matches

boolean matches(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
Test whether the given HttpServletRequest matches this statement.

Parameters:
req - the HttpServletRequest to process.
Returns:
true if the request matches the statement.
